Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer of $15000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can positively impact your goals. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
